title: @Riot: Grave's AA animation
body:
I don't have any video of it, but I was playing graves when I noticed after I used my ult my AA would cause a huge explosion graphic to appear for a split second (only for the duration of the AA animation) as if the ult or something of the sorts was exploding with every AA. It eventually went away in the game so not that big of a deal; however, while it was happening it was definitely debilitating vision wise being a huge distraction as you can imagine.

Just thought I'd throw it out there as i'm sure you guys are finding plenty of bugs with all the changes!

replies.body:
Hey Legalisskull, 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=2TAjXmFU,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-16T21:37:53.840+0000)
>
> Hey Legalisskull, 
> 
> Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix.

Awesome! I know you guys always look for feedback on various issues so thought i'd try and help! :P

While we are on the topic of graves AA animation, when graves takes scuttle crab it often feels jittery. He autos it and knocks it back, his next auto is queued up to attack, but the scuttle crab leaves his range because of the knockback and he cancels the attack to move forward to get another. Then he reloads which takes long enough to walk up to scuttle again and ... repeat...

I saw this too, and so did a teammate of mine apparently.

Could give pretty much anybody epilepsy if they were exposed to it enough. Happened to me in the last 5 minutes or so of my game but I pray to god this doesn't happen early in the game to anyone else.
